channel.title: Testscape combat.. will rep for help =)
channel.description:
okay I have been working on testscape for a little while now.. But for some reason if you have no weapon equipped then you will attack around 2x the normal speed. another is that when you are suppose to be unnarmed it will say "NONEXISTING ITEM"
sorry if I do no have my questions worded right xD anyong know how I could fix both of these problem =]
thanks, Lkcthereturn

item.title: Testscape combat.. will rep for help =)

item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

LKCTheReturn:

its possible… many servers are based off testscape and has little or no lagg.

feel free.

Read full topic

@cows1471 wrote:

Thats because testscape is unstable.

Its meant to test things e.g. methods.

Not to be used as a server.
